name: Jewelry Inc.
description:
WARNING!
If you go back to the menu, the cursor will disappear :D In that case - refresh the page. Sorry!

Also the level select scene always shows the last unlocked and the first level. Some bug...

Open Source: https://github.com/halfdan87/JewelryInc

Feel free to create your own versions!

==============================

A game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

You work as a jewelry manufacturer for an evil jewelry company.

Your goal is to put gems in corresponding sockets and then put the rings/earrings into a container for further shipping.

Will you be able to work through all the levels in this colorful, relaxingly-annoying game?
